Channelgun.help: Your backpack has a built in energy Longfang Channelgun which fires bolts of energy. Damage: Moderate Recharge: Fast
Channelgun.targetHelp: Your Defense has been reduced by the energy bursts.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.

Slice.help: The arms of your backpack may be used to slice at opponents for moderate lethal damage, as well as reducing their defense. Damage: Moderate Recharge: Medium
Slice.targetHelp: Your Defense has been reduced by the Claws.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

Longfang.help: Your Longfang Channelgun may also fire short bursts, causing greater damage. This attack also reduces your foe's defense. Damage: High Recharge: Medium
Longfang.targetHelp: Your Defense has been reduced by the energy bursts.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.

Aim.help: Greatly increases your chance to hit with attacks for a few seconds. Slightly increases damage. Recharge: Long

messages.attackerHit: You take a moment to concentrate and are much more accurate for a short while.

Suppression.help: Your Longfang Channelgun may also fire long bursts of energy, causing moderate damage in an large cone in front of you. Damage: Moderate Recharge: Medium
Suppression.targetHelp: Your Defense has been reduced by the energy bursts.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage over time.

Arm_Lash.help: The Crab Spider's backpack is capable of making rapid attacks with its many arms dealing heavy damage to foes within a short cone in front of the user. Damage: Heavy Recharge: Medium

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

CS_Venom_Grenade.help: This poisonous grenade causes toxic damage over time and weakens the resistance of all foes within the area of effect. NOTE: If you take this power you cannot also take the Wolf Spider version. Damage: Moderate Recharge: Long
CS_Venom_Grenade.targetHelp: The poisonous gas has severely weakened your resistance to attacks.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Toxic damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Toxic damage over time.

CS_Frag_Grenade.help: Launches an M30 Grenade at long range from an arm of your backpack. The explosion from this grenade affects all within the blast and can knock them back. Note: If you take this power, you cannot take the Wolf Spider version. Damage: Moderate Recharge: Medium
CS_Frag_Grenade.shortHelp: Ranged(Targeted AoE), Moderate DMG (Lethal/Smash), Foe Knockback

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

messages.attackerHit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

Frenzy.help: You can energize and lash out with your arms, causing both lethal and energy damage to all foes surrounding you. This attack also weakens the Defense of those struck. Damage: Heavy Recharge: Moderate
Frenzy.targetHelp: Your Defense has been reduced by the {Powername}.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.

Omega_Maneuver.help: You may use the Arachnos Teleportation system to summon an Omega Bomb in the midst of your enemies. The Omega Bomb immediately sends out a short range psionic signal and hypnotic light display to draw the attention of those nearby, causing them to approach the device. Then it detonates, causing massive damage to all enemies in a wide radius. Damage: Superior Recharge: Long
Omega_Maneuver.shortHelp: Summon Omega Bomb: Ranged (Location Targeted AoE), Superior DMG (Smashing/Energy), Foe Disorient
